decision_conditions:
The works to which this consent relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this decision notice.

Reason: To comply with the requirements of Section 18(1)(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plans listed in this notice.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

All new external and internal works and finishes and works of making good to the retained fabric, shall match the existing adjacent work with regard to the methods used and to material, colour, texture and profile, unless shown otherwise on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved.

Reason: To ensure that the appearance of the building is satisfactory, that it safeguards the special architectural and/or historic interest of the building (Policies Q5, Q8, Q11, Q20 and Q22 of the Lambeth Local Plan (2021)).

Prior to the construction of the relevant part of the work of the development hereby permitted, detailed drawings at a scale of 1:5 and 1:20 of the proposed door connecting the basement stair lobby to the proposed office space (as shown on drawing no. 630-AA-DJA-DR-A-10001 Rev.T01) basement level stairwell shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. The development hereby permitted shall be thereafter built in accordance with the approved details.

Reason: To ensure that the internal appearance of the building is satisfactory and that it protects and enhances the original historic fabric of the Grade II Listed Building (Policy Q20 of the Lambeth Local Plan (2021)).

Prior to the first operation of the building services plant hereby approved, a glazing plan, with supporting elevational drawings, of all windows to be replaced in accordance with the Pace Consulting Noise Impact Assessment dated 26th September 2023 (reference no. PC-22-0299-RP1 Rev.C) shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority.

Reason: To protect the amenities of adjoining occupiers and the surrounding area (Policy Q2 of the London Borough of Lambeth Local Plan (2021)).

Installation of all fixed mechanical equipment and building services plant hereby approved shall be undertaken in accordance with the submitted plans and specifications, as detailed in the Pace Consulting Noise Impact Assessment dated 26th September 2023 (reference no. PC-22-0299-RP1 Rev.C).

Reason: To protect the amenities of adjoining occupiers and the surrounding area (Policy Q2 of the Lambeth Local Plan (2021)).

The Rated sound level from any noise associated with the use of the premises shall not exceed the Background sound level (LA90 15min) at the nearest noise sensitive premises. Furthermore, the associated sound level shall not be more than 10 dB(A) above the background sound level in this location. For the purposes of this condition the Background, Rating and Specific sound levels shall be calculated in full accordance with the methodology of BS4142:2014+A1:2019 Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound.

Reason: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance due to the operation of the premises use in accordance with Policy Q2 of the Lambeth Local Plan (2021).
subdivision_of_building:
Streatham Library
Basement:
-  Storage rooms
Ground Floor:
- Library
- Hall
First Floor:
- Meeting Room and corridor
- Meeting rooms

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA CA54 : Streatham High Rd Streatham Hill Conservation Area
TOWNPS Streatham High Road Major Centre Primary Shopping Area
ART4 Class MA Article 4 Town Centre Locations

description:
Alterations to Streatham Library and Hall:- Refurbishment of Basement accommodation to provide office space; Creation of mercantile area, selling stationery items, to ground floor Library area; Roof and ceiling repairs and redecoration of the existing Hall; Replacement of blinds to Hall windows and roof lights; Installation of hearing loop to Hall; Alteration to wall and door layout on first floor to provide new locker room; Secondary glazing to first floor meeting room windows; Reinstatement of window fire exit from first floor locker room; Installation of panic button and alarm to first floor one to one room; Installation of new heating and cooling system

(Please be advised that this application is linked with an existing listed building consent application Ref: 23/00327/LB)
